column4: Sorry, computer crashed when fiddling with ccsm. Still have this problem where I can not move windows with my mouse, not even while holding alt, or by trying the new unity handles
or for that matter, by right clicking the window manager and clicking "move"; any ideas?
ill give that a try, thanks!
Dr_willis:  "unity --reset" is the unity-and-compiz-back-to-defaults-and-restart-unity command, for reference.
